com.googlecode.sarasvati
Interface Arc

All Known Implementing Classes:
HibArc, MemArc
public interface Arc

Arcs describe the relationships between Nodes. Arcs are directed links between Nodes. During the execution of a Process, arcs will determine in what order tokens are generated in Nodes. Arc may be labeled with a name. The name can be used for flow control.

Author:
Paul Lorenz

Field Summary
static String DEFAULT_ARC
          If no name is specified for an Arc, it will be given the default name, which is the empty string.
 
Method Summary
 Node getEndNode()
          Returns the Node at the end of the arc.
 String getName()
          Returns the arc name.
 Node getStartNode()
          Returns the Node at the start of the arc.
 

Field Detail

DEFAULT_ARC

static final String DEFAULT_ARC
If no name is specified for an Arc, it will be given the default name, which is the empty string.

getName

String getName()
Returns the arc name. This name should never be null, but it may be blank.

Returns:
The arc name.
